Le'slick

Salon and Beauty parlour

Our Hair Salon aims to give our customers the best possible hairdressing experience.

Why Our Clients Choose Us

Le'Slick is one of the premier hair salons in Nairobi and the neigbouring counties, frequented not only by women but by men and kids as well.

Our hair salon has earned an incredible reputation as our professional team of hairstylists continues to work wonders on clients’ hair and enhance their assets through the wide array of offered services.

Our Services

We offer a complete range of hair and other beauty services including haircuts & styling, coloring, eyebrow and eyelash tinting, perming, hair straightening, manicure,pedicure and a lot more. You can learn more about our services below.

haircuts

Our salon offers high-quality haircuts for both adults and children from highly trained, professional stylists

coloring

One of the most popular hairstyling services at Modern, coloring can completely change the way your haircut looks.

coloring

One of the most popular hairstyling services at Modern, coloring can completely change the way your haircut looks.
